Rada's blessing 4 is an Achievement diary reward for completing all elite Kourend & Kebos Diary tasks. It can be claimed from Elise in the Kourend Castle courtyard.

Rada's blessing 4 gives the best-in-slot prayer bonus for the ammunition slot at +2, surpassing god blessings.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Defence bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+2List

Contents

  • 1 Benefits
    • 1.1 From Rada's blessing 1, 2 and 3
    • 1.2 Rada's blessing 4 only
  • 2 Changes

Benefits[edit | edit source]

From Rada's blessing 1, 2 and 3[edit | edit source]

  • Increased drop rate of Xeric's talisman (1/250 to 1/125), excluding stone chests
  • Free access to Crabclaw Isle
  • 5% chance to mine two dense essence blocks at once
  • Unlimited teleports to the Kourend Woodland
  • Ability to use a slayer helmet as a Shayzien helm (5) by talking to Captain Cleive
  • 5% increased yield from Hosidius and Farming Guild herb patches

Rada's blessing 4 only[edit | edit source]

  • Unlimited teleports to Mount Karuulm
  • 8% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional XP is given), excluding Tempoross
  • 20 slayer reward points for completing Konar's Slayer tasks
  • 10% reduced burn chance at the Hosidius Kitchens, up from 5%
  • 80 free dynamite a day from Thirus
  • 10% additional blood runes when crafting blood runes at the Zeah altar (no additional XP is given, doesn't work in GotR)
  • Protection from the burn effect in the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon without the need for boots of stone, boots of brimstone, or granite boots
  • Reduced tanning prices at Eodan in Forthos Dungeon to 20% of his standard price.
  • Additional +1 to blessing's prayer bonus

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
4 July 2019
(update | poll)

Addition of Eodan tanning price reduction benefit.

[[File:Rada's blessing 4 detail.png|left|130x200px]]
'''Rada's blessing 4''' is an [[Achievement diary]] reward for completing all elite [[Kourend & Kebos Diary]] tasks. It can be claimed from [[Elise]] in the [[Kourend Castle]] courtyard.

Rada's blessing 4 gives the best-in-slot [[prayer bonus]] for the ammunition slot at +2, surpassing [[god blessing]]s.
{{Infobox Bonuses
|astab = 0
|aslash = 0
|acrush = 0
|amagic = 0
|arange = 0

|dslash = 0
|dcrush = 0
|dmagic = 0
|drange = 0

|prayer = +2
|slot = ammo
}}
==Benefits==
===From [[Rada's blessing 1]], [[Rada's blessing 2|2]] and [[Rada's blessing 3|3]]===
* Increased drop rate of [[Xeric's talisman]] (1/250 to 1/125), '''excluding''' [[stone chest]]s
* Free access to [[Crabclaw Isle]]
* 5% chance to mine two [[dense essence block]]s at once
* Unlimited teleports to the [[Kourend Woodland]]
* Ability to use a [[slayer helmet]] as a [[Shayzien helm (5)]] by talking to [[Captain Cleive]]
* 5% increased yield from [[Hosidius]] and [[Farming Guild]] [[herb patch]]es

===Rada's blessing 4 only===
* Unlimited teleports to [[Mount Karuulm]]
* 8% chance to catch two fish at once everywhere when equipped (no additional XP is given), '''excluding''' [[Tempoross]]
* 20 [[slayer reward point]]s for completing [[Konar]]'s [[Slayer task]]s
* 10% reduced burn chance at the [[Hosidius Kitchen]]s, up from 5%
* 80 free [[dynamite]] a day from [[Thirus]]
* 10% additional [[blood rune]]s when crafting blood runes at the Zeah altar (no additional XP is given, doesn't work in GotR)
* Protection from the burn effect in the [[Karuulm Slayer Dungeon]] without the need for [[boots of stone]], [[boots of brimstone]], or [[granite boots]]
* Reduced tanning prices at [[Eodan]] in [[Forthos Dungeon]] to 20% of his standard price.
*Additional +1 to blessing's prayer bonus
